name: Quotidiano.net
about: The Monrif group consists of some of the most important Italian newspapers including "Il Resto del Carlino", "Quotidiano.net", "La Nazione", "Il Giorno" and others.
description: Redesign of all the newspaper websites with a new slick clean look & feel.
myWork: As the lead UI/UX designer, I worked on the redesign of all the groups newspapers websites from concept to development.

name: IOM Italy
about: IOM is the International Migrants Organization, IOM tracks the movement of people across borders in all regions of the world.
description: IOM Profiler is a web application that focuses on collecting information about migrants and using this information to show graphs and create reports.
myWork: In this project I was the lead Front-end developer, I worked on the scaffolding, defining the file structure and code style, created the HTML interface and styled it with SASS Preprocessor, I worked with REST APIs to implement CRUD functionalities in the application.

name: Rinascimento.com
about: Rinascimento is one of the biggest ecommerce in the clothing industry.
myWork: For rinascimento i worked as a Front-end developer, implementing new interface modules and bug fixing.

name: b2b.rinascimento.com
about: Rinascimento is one of the biggest ecommerce in the clothing industry.
description: Rinascimento has a stand alone business oriented website, as the Front-end developer I was in charge of the complete implementation of the redesigned user interface.
myWork: as the only Front-end developer I was in charge of the implementation of the redesigned user interface.

name: Agro BASF.it
about: BASF is a German chemical company and the largest chemical producer in the world.
description: Interface designer and content curator for Agro BASF Italian portal from 2014 to 2016
myWork: For BASF I worked as Interface designer and content curator for the Agro BASF Italian portal from 2014 to 2016.

name: Biggest job on earth
about: BASF is a German chemical company and the largest chemical producer in the world.
description: This official BASF website tells the story of Agricoltour, a tour around Italy to showcase the life of farmers thought interviews, photos and videos.
myWork: In this project I worked as Interface designer and content curator.

name: Assistenza Clementoni
about: Clementoni is one of the biggest italian toy making companies.
description: Assistenza Clementoni is a web application that allows clients who have purchased Clementoni tablets to send requests about their products directly to the company, creating a queue of tickets or trough a chat system.
myWork: In this project I worked as the lead graphic designer and as a Front-end developer.

name: Sherbet Lemon v1
about: Sherbet Lemon was a personal project of mine.
description: Sherbet Lemon is a creative communication agency, it"s focus are: innovative design, social media marketing and search engine optimization. I worked on the website concept and development as well as the branding.
myWork: I worked on the website concept and development as well as the branding.

name: Sherbet Lemon v2
about: Sherbet Lemon was a personal project of mine.
description: Sherbet Lemon is a creative communication agency, it"s focus are: innovative design, social media marketing and search engine optimization. I worked on the website concept and development as well as the branding.
myWork: I worked on the website concept and development as well as the branding.

name: Amus website mockup
about: Amus is a company that specializes in security and technical assistance.
description: This is a rebranding of an existing website that I made in my spare time, I gave myself a goal: retain the existing informations on the site and make a cleaner version in witch is also easier to navigate.
myWork: For this project I did a mockup of the website in photoshop.

name: WIM.TV
about: WIM.TV is a video streaming platform that focuses on sharing with a close network of contacts, you an use to share events with a mailing list, you can use it to present video footage of pay per view events, or just share without filters.
description: In this project I redesigned the front page and detail page of the application.
myWork: The work I made on this concept is focused on presenting the informations in a clean and efficent way. I also wroked on addvertising materials, for example an infographic animation used by the company on an international event.
